Interface Beacon

All Superinterfaces:
ControllerIO, Device, SonarObject
All Known Implementing Classes:
BeaconImpl
public interface Beacon extends Device
A Beacon is a light which flashes toward oncoming traffic.
Author:
Douglas Lau

    • getVerifyPin

      Integer getVerifyPin()
      Get the controller I/O verify pin number. If this is different than "pin", this relay pin energizes the verify circuit.
